nodes.text: The North Conical Mountains were an arrangement of seven cones—six small cones surrounding a large, center cone — situated at one end of Centerpoint Station's Hollowtown. It was believed that this unusual geometric array of cones generated the power needed to operate the powerful tractor beam of Centerpoint Station, as it resembled ancient devices of a similar nature. The largest cone was often referred to as the North Conical Mountain.
